samples.question: Could you describe a person who you regularly follow on social media?
samples.transcript: >> I follow Hungon who is a famous Korean footballer on social media >> as he as I said before he is a football player, professional football player. he is not only famous in Korea, he is pretty famous worldwide. He plays for such a popular team, Tottenham Hotspur, the most popular league, Premier League. >> Yes. of course well he is very famous and actually I have liked him for a long time actually since he played for Hamuk in Germany he used to play for Bundesliga he started his career there well he usually I think he usually post his moments of playing football in his league like not only his league champions league or FA Cup or other competitions as well as national teams games. So I follow him on social media because of course I like him as a footballer. I like his play and I like his attitude. But not only that, I also like him as a person. I like his character. He when I listen to his interview, he is very humble and he is always dedicated to the team. So, I love his attitude and I am really happy to see his moments and postings on social media and I hope to be a fan of him for a long time. >> Okay, perfect. So, that is a minute and a half. All right, nice one. S.

samples.question: >> So, do you think it is easy to make friends on social media?
samples.transcript: Actually I do not think so. because social media is an online platform. in my opinion without offline meeting I think it is really extremely difficult to become friends. So of course you can easily chat with new people and probably you can approach others very easily because you can basically send a message directly through the function but I do not think it is easy because in order to become friends you need to meet you need to have an offline meeting so I think it is really difficult to make friends through or by social media. Mhm.
